author: assaf
msg: This release is for Mac OS X 10.6(Snow Leopard).
Snow Loepard only ship JVM without compat.
So Rjb must load new dylib and call jvm function directly.
This change has no effect to other platform

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1963: Fixed race condition when stopping camel that was most apparent when using camel-jms with jms listeners. Fixed Camel main app to thrown exception if startup failed for some reason.

author: luc
msg: Fixed a OutOfBoundException in simplex solver when some constraints are tight
